bibl.title: Letter from Tom D. Spies to Philip Showalter Hench, October 31, 1953

div1.p: Spies is pleased that the Cubans are giving Hench the Order of Carlos Manuel de Cespedes award.

div1.head: Letter from Tom D. Spies to Philip Showalter Hench, October 31, 1953
div1.opener:
NORTHWESTERN UNIVERSITY
DEPARTMENT OF NUTRITION AND METABOLISM
450 EAST OHIO STREET, CHICAGO 11, ILLINOIS
October 31, 1953
TELEPHONE: DELEVARE 7-6314
Dr. P. S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnesota
Dear Phil:
div1.p:
I was pleased to see that the Cubans had decided to honor them-
selves by giving you the Order of Carlos Manuel de Céspedes award. Tell
Mary that I think she merits at least half of it.

I'm glad that you and Paul de Kruif got together. I wish you
would come to see us soon.
div1.closer: Sincerely yours, Tom D. Spies, M. D. TDS:bs
